entries.content: Share pricing or a range of pricing options on your website.
entries.notes: Proactive strategy to address potential price objections early in the buyer journey.

entries.content: Use website pricing to qualify leads based on affordability before they reach the sales rep.
entries.notes: Ensures sales team speaks to prospects who can afford the service/product, preventing unqualified price objections.

entries.content: Don't be scared to share pricing on your website; it's one of the best things you can do.
entries.notes: Counter-intuitive advice for some businesses regarding price transparency.

entries.content: Save sales reps time by avoiding calls with prospects who cannot afford the offering, achieved by sharing pricing upfront.
entries.notes: Focuses sales effort on qualified opportunities, indirectly handling price objections by preventing them with poor fits.

focus_area: Handling Price Objections: Reframe to ROI, "Compared to what?", breakdown strategy
